channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia news live: Adelaide writers’ week fiasco was ‘masterclass in poor governance’, outgoing director Louise Adler says
item.description: Adler tells the ABC’s 7.30 the turmoil was a ‘watershed’ moment but event will ‘rise from the ashes’. Follow live Get our breaking news email , free a...

item.title: Iran crisis live: Trump says killers of protesters will ‘pay a big price’ and urges Iranians to ‘take over your institutions’
item.description: US president cancels meetings with Iranian officials ‘until senseless killing of protesters stops’ Trump says countries doing business with Iran face ...

item.title: Judge blocks White House bid to revoke whistleblower lawyer’s security clearance
item.description: Mark Zaid, a national security attorney, regains access to classified material after accusing White House of retaliation After the Donald Trump admini...

item.title: Trump threatens to revoke citizenship of naturalized immigrants convicted of fraud - US politics live
item.description: US president uses winding speech trailed to be on affordability to attack immigrants Donald Trump is heading to Detroit, Michigan today, where he’ll t...

item.title: US supreme court appears poised to uphold laws banning trans athletes
item.description: A ruling against two athletes in West Virginia and Idaho could have far-reaching implications for civil rights The US supreme court on Tuesday appeare...

item.title: Bulger killer Jon Venables set for parole hearing
item.description: Jon Venables, 10 when he killed James Bulger in 1993, failed in a previous bid for parole in 2023.

item.title: Government drops plans for mandatory digital ID to work in UK
item.description: There will still be digital checks on those starting a new job, but people will not need to hold a digital ID.

item.title: Suspended London Pride boss accused of 'frustrating' theft investigation
item.description: Lawyers for Pride in London say Christopher Joell-Deshields has failed to hand back company accounts.

item.title: Carrick confirmed as Man Utd caretaker head coach
item.description: Manchester United appoint former player Michael Carrick as caretaker head coach until the end of the season.

item.title: More than 2,000 people reported killed at Iran protests as Trump says 'help is on its way'
item.description: A US-based rights group says it has confirmed the killing of 1,850 protesters during a crackdown by authorities, as the US president urges Iranians to...
